title: Drawing, "Peak on the Sunshine Fork, Clark's Fork Canyon, Wyoming", July 16, 1892
signed: Signed with initials and dated in graphite ?, upper right: July 16th, 1892/ ... T M.
inscribed:
Recto: Inscribed in graphite, upper right corner: Peak on the sunshine fork/ July 16th, 1892/ Volcanic Rock chocolate color on white sandstone/ T M; again at upper right background: Clark's Fork Canyon; and other notations at various points: Crater/ white/ island trees.
Verso: Inscribed in ?: No. 229.
description: Horizontal view of a volcanic mountain across a valley.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Peak on the Sunshine Fork, Clark's Fork Canyon, Wyoming", July 16, 1892.
July 16, 1892. Graphite on paper.. Gift of Thomas Moran. 1917-17-59.
